entry.title: "ğŸµ Trains"
entry.summary:
There seems to be a new trend in music videos on the internet: train videos. Mostly so called Driverâ€™s Eye View videos are combined with (often electronic) music.

Oldenburg label Fakeland published a mix by Ãœberwassersystem accompanied by a video of the Berlin S-Bahn route S 41.

Railway enthuasiasts â€¦
entry.content:
There seems to be a new trend in music videos on the internet: train videos. Mostly so called Driverâ€™s Eye View videos are combined with (often electronic) music.

Oldenburg label Fakeland published a mix by Ãœberwassersystem accompanied by a video of the Berlin S-Bahn route S 41.

Railway enthuasiasts around the world shoot so called Driverâ€™s Eye View videos, often without adding adding any music, only recording the sounds of the moving train. This music video trend is a combination of two subcultures: the train culture and the music culture.

The German TV show Die schÃ¶nsten Bahnstrecken Deutschlands should not be forgotten. It gained popularity because it seemed extraordinarily boring to a lot of people.
